plot: A new visitor to Hong Kong, searches Lan Kwai Fong for love, only to get rejected time and time again. He has a surprise in store when he finally connects with a girl who has been observing him all night.
title: King of Bullsh*t
plot_es: A new visitor to Hong Kong, searches Lan Kwai Fong for love, only to get rejected time and time again. He has a surprise in store when he finally connects with a girl who has been observing him all night.
plot_en: A new visitor to Hong Kong, searches Lan Kwai Fong for love, only to get rejected time and time again. He has a surprise in store when he finally connects with a girl who has been observing him all night.

cast.role: The Girl He Tells a Joke
cast.name: Gwendoline Bestar
